name: Fantasy Craft
description:
Fantasy Craft is a third-person single and co-op medieval fantasy life simulator with survival and RPG elements. In Fantasy Craft you take a part of the main character who lost his father and had to move to his uncle to the village of Lovely-dale to start a new adult life.
You can choose any occupation: an alchemist, a blacksmith, a carpenter, a hunter, a cook, a tailor or you may learn all the professions.
You will meet your old friends and get acquainted with new people in the village. You can explore the beautiful places full of mysteries.

HUNT, FISH, FARM, COOK
To survive in this wonderful fantasy world, you will have to hunt, fish, farm and cook food.

BREW POTIONS
If you want to increase your health, strength, agility, weight, need an antidote or somethings else you can learn how to brew potions.

CUT DOWN TREES AND MINE MINERAL RESOURCES
To build a house and different workbenches you should cut down trees, mine mineral resources.

TRADE WITH NPCs
You can earn money by crafting things and selling them to traders or on the market.

GO TREASURE HUNTING
If you want adventures, you can go treasure hunting to magnificent secret places, but you have to fight the bizarre monsters, protecting these treasures.
Your incredible journey to the fantasy world starts here.

Features in the game:
• Beautiful picturesque open world locations.
• Alternation of day and night and weather conditions changes.
• Interactive environment that gives the opportunity to cut down the trees, to collect sticks, stones, to mine ores and minerals, pick plants, to loot boxes and barrels, to pick locks to chests and so on.
• A few variants of house building.
• Researching system helps you to open new blueprints in the workbenches, you should research the things you find in the researching table.
• Crafting different equipment, tools, weapons, furniture, clothing and so on.
• Brewing various potions increasing health, strength, agility, armor, weight, oxygen and a lot more.
• Interesting farming system that helps to cook more complex dishes.
• Interaction with diverse wild animals and mysterious monsters.
• Multiple fishing zones with common and rare fish.
• Levelling up character’s skills.
• Interaction with NPCs including quests and trade.
• Balanced trading and economy system.
• An opportunity to fulfil orders in the Board of orders.
• A possibility to expand your land by buying the near-by plots of land.
• A variety of well-protected caves with essential and rare resources.
